title: Snow Bound
description: The wrong person has learned their secret…From USA Today Best-Selling Author, Elizabeth Kirke, comes the continuation of her award-winning More Than Magic Series!After fighting alongside mermaids and werewolves, Jen finds returning to her mundane college existence a bore. Worse yet, she can’t show her magical truth to anyone... except Rak. As familiars go, Rak’s great; still, the sassy black cat couldn’t take away the sting of missing the friends she made over the summer.Finally, after five months apart, the gang is gathering for two weeks of snow, togetherness, and magic! Unfortunately, fun on the slopes takes a deadly turn with the arrival of a mysterious guest. As the hills run red with blood, Jen learns there are far more dangerous things than vampires in the world. With a sinister threat closing in, Jen and her friends find themselves fighting to make it off the mountain alive...Snow Bound is the second book in the Urban Fantasy series, More than Magic, packed with witches, vampires, elementals, and a snarky black cat. If you like your magic mixed with a little suspense and dash of sweet romance, grab your copy and settle in by the fire!
author: Elizabeth Kirke
